website_summaries.verdict: Attractive, handcrafted bamboo spice rack organizes your cabinet.
pros: Bamboo rack expands from 8.75-inches to 15-inches wide
Tiered shelves make it easy to find your spices
cons: A handful of owners felt the shelves were too shallow for their spice bottles

customer_reviews.title: i wanted to love it, but was left disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to upgrade from my cheap, white plastic tiered spice rack. the wood is nice quality. however, the 1/4 inch thickness of the wood leaves any spice jars that are placed on the crease to sit unevenly. Additionally, there is space between the bottom of the rack and the cabinet due to the edging on the wood. Also, the insert tends to slant inward once extended. Lastly, i was charged $5 for the return... my fault for not checking the return policy before purchase. anyway, i'll stick with my cheap plastic rack, that has lasted over 20 years!... i guess the adage don't try to fix something that isn't broken applies here ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tami Fiorito

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived broken, a strip of wood had already come unglued. Additionally, the varnish was not well applied, and there are drip marks on the side. I didn't even bother using it. As a side note - when you have the shelf extended, there is a 1/4" or so difference in height on the slide out portion, so your spices will not line up neatly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: It's been long time I was looking for spices organizer and finally find this to catch my satisfaction! I love it so much ! Right order! you will see in the picture how it makes my cabinet organized and look beautiful!!!! I think picture says everything about this organizer and show you why I gave five stars! Good quality and good package too 😊
customer_reviews.author: Elham Sharifpour

customer_reviews.title: So Glad These Exist!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for the tiny little area that I had to store my spices. I didn't think it would fit at first but because my shelves lift up I was able to angle it in in such a way that they fit perfectly when I slid them open. I went to all kinds of kitchen stores and looked for gadgets that I could make to fit in these little spaces. But these worked perfectly they're pretty to look at and seem very well-made that the last for years and years. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: princesscafb

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend This Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at a carousel to store my essential oils when I came across this spice organizer & thought this may work better at a fraction of the cost. I received my order in two days and was impressed with the quality as well as the purpose for my intended use. I'm going to purchase one for my mom to store her essential oils & several more for my spices.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very Flexible and Attractive Option for Organization
customer_reviews.text: You get EXACTLY what they promise you in the description; it's sturdy and can adjust to snugly (or not) fit the cabinet or counter top. All of your spices can be neatly arranged in any order of your liking: old to new, spicy to mild, frequently used to rarely used, inexpensive to expensive, etc. It can be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald MalcolmTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. I knocked a star off because of the gap though. I like that is expands, but then the spice jars don't sit at the same height. Luckily I can line the jars up so the middle one that is sitting on the ledge has support on each side and doesn't fall down, but I have new jars coming in the mail today so we'll see if they line up as well. Also when it's pulled all the way apart it bends a little so could be a problem down the road if I ever tried to slide it forward (the middle could buckle back).
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Gores

customer_reviews.title: It was just okay...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cabinet to organize my spices. Plus is that it looks more clean, downside is that it doesn't expand enough to fill my cabinet space so there is a gap which feels like wasted space. Also, you can't see the name of the spices from the row above it. I was hoping it would make it quicker to read and find my spices but mostly it just makes my cabinet look a little more clean. It was an okay buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The extension is a different color. Not that big of deal. However, there is a good size height difference, making it impossible to organize. In addition the bamboo on the larger side was warped. You can’t put things on or near the height difference as they topple over. This was discovered after trying to reorganize my spices. Then when I tried to organize them I found that I lost a lot of space. I removed them and immediately returned it. I purchased something else here that totally fits the bill. I cannot recommend this item, no matter what your intended application is.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this and have been needing something to options better in my spice cabinet. Unfortunately, the picture is deceiving and you can only stack a few on the whole thing. Regular sized spice bottles (McCormick, etc) hangs over the edge making the spice bottle on the step below knock off since it cannot sit straight. I made it work but only able to add 7 spice bottles total on it when it has the potential for 15+. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not solid
customer_reviews.text: The pictures make this look like it's solid or could possibly have a solid back. It doesn't, and it isn't balanced very well, at that. As a result, unless I put the lightest items on the top row and the heaviest on the bottom row, regardless of height or size, it tips back and spills the contents into the depths of the pantry. Probably won't return it, because it works just fine the way I have it set up, but I was very disappointed when I placed a small bottle of vanilla onto the top row and the whole thing tipped backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy S

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I laid mine down in my drawer and it is perfect! I was so sick and tired and all the spice bottles floating around the cupboards and falling over and getting lost, etc. This worked out PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Miller Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my cupboard size
customer_reviews.text: I love this spice rack. It replaced a three tier metal rack that was too tall for bottles to sit on the top level. My cupboard is in a corner so the opening at the front is narrower than the interior. Because this rack has an adjustable width it was easy to slide it in the door and then expand it to the full width of the interior. It holds more than twice the number of bottles than my old rack.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but measure your drawer
customer_reviews.text: This spice holder is very nice, but unfortunately I had to return it because it was too tall for my drawer. Once spices were on it, my drawer wouldn't close because the spices were too tall on it to do so. Measure the sides of your drawer first to make sure that once the holder has spices on it, it will fit. If so, buy it because it's really nice. I was bummed that I couldn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: MIA

customer_reviews.title: What You See is What You Get
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack is perfect for what I needed: organization and easy access to all the spices I use the most, and now I can buy even more. The only gripe is that you can't necessarily see what each thing is if the bottles on the lower tiers are the same height as the ones on the upper tier. But honestly that's not even a real issue if you have different sized bottles or labels.
customer_reviews.author: Icee Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but didn't keep it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit enough spices to our liking and we returned it. However overall it was nice, fit in the drawer and was well built and of great quality. I would recommend under the right circumstances on what spices you have. My wife and I have pretty much every spice they sell at the store, and we were going to buy multiple of these for the drawers
customer_reviews.author: Michael Logan

customer_reviews.title: I found a new idea for spice racks
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these “spice racks”. I no intention of using them as such. I have a large collection of the hinged treasure boxes, but putting them on a shelf with no elevation,you really are unable to appreciate all that you are looking at. So, I had an idea this might work. I covered them with velvet and my “hare brained”. Idea worked out far better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.author: beachnana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. It expands to fit perfectly into the space I wanted it and I am using it to store my essential oils that I cook with. It works great. The shelves are really deep, so even if you were using them for spices, I think 2 jars would fit in the depth. So, this thing holds a lot of product.
customer_reviews.author: K Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: This works to supplement my spice cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the flow over for bottles of spices not used daily or frequently - caraway seeds, 5-spice blend - or for bottles holding extra spices used so frequently that it's nice to have a place to put the spices on glass bottles. I prefer not to leave in plastic or even paper bags. It's worked out.
customer_reviews.author: wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like these little shelves they work really great for me and my spice cupboard. They hold the standard size spice jars perfectly. It's not a complaint but I guess I bought a two pack and didn't know I thought only one was in the purchase so I had to find another spot for that but they work great.
customer_reviews.author: keira

customer_reviews.title: This was microscopic
customer_reviews.text: So small even when expanded, and the shelves are not deep enough to hold the spices! I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit in a standard cabinet drawer
customer_reviews.text: I chose the model to fit in a drawer. First, the stickers on the organizer were impossible to get off and left a residue of adhesive I can’t scrub off. But that’s nothing compared to the main issue - when I load the organizer with spices I can’t close my standard-sized cabinet drawer. The problem is the height not the width. This makes it pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shelves
customer_reviews.text: Shelves were so narrow I can’t use it for spice jars or any of my containers. Not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.author: Charlsie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack works great for me! Depending on the size/style spice bottles I find it to fit roughly 4 per level when closed and 7 to 8 when open. The slide out section is slightly smaller in length than the other section. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Space-saver but sags on an uneven shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to free up cabinet space and it's done that very effectively. The only complaint is a minor aesthetic one: our house is a bit old, so the shelves are slightly downward-bending, and at the current extension (about 1/2 of the full length) it dips in the middle. Presumably this wouldn't be an issue on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Chadbourne

customer_reviews.title: Can rack or spice rack perfect for either .....
customer_reviews.text: Did a previous review same product. This is an amazing can rack as well not just a spice rack perfect raise for cans to be tired in deeper cabinets so you can see what's in the great leveling to show name if product I inckuded pictures of 2 if my cabinets that I have used the in for canned items...
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Took up more room then needed
customer_reviews.text: I saw a YouTuber who had this so I decided to order it and while the idea is good and might work for some, it didn’t work for us. It barley had enough room for my spices and it in the end took up more room then needed and I didn’t have enough room for everything in my cupboard so I did return it. It is a nice color though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is AAAAAMMAAZONGGGG
customer_reviews.text: Will accommodate any cabinet because of the way you can adjust the length, listen I can see ALL my spices now and it has made my life with cooking 300000x easier and it looks really cute and aesthetically pleasing! I open my cabinet just to admire the organization of my spices.. 10/10 get it
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, sturdy, I recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is nice! Definitely exceeded my expectations for the price point. Works perfectly in my cabinet to organize my spices. I wish the shelves were a little higher, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made spice organizer. I measured the inside of my cabinet to make sure it would fit. It came earlier than expected, and packaged nicely. It fits great and I love that I can make it longer or smaller to fit everything in my cabinet. Very happy with this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spice storage rack
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver! I used to keep all my spices in the specially built storage on the door of one of my cabinets, we moved to a new house where i don't have that kind of storage or space to build it. Moreover, most of my cabinets have pull out drawers instead of regular shelves now. I found this spice rack here and ordered two. It fit perfectly in my drawer and I was able to fit all my spices very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Varya

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied aside from poor product packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product as advertised in description. Sizing is as noted and it has a good weight to it. Fits a total of 12-4oz spice jars (4 per row) like the glass jars shown in the photos. Would recommend! Only downside is it arrived unwrapped directly inside a bubble mailer. The tray organizer was not damaged upon arrival, fortunately. Not sure if this is how the product is normally sent out though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured/represented
customer_reviews.text: Like--it's exactly as I expected. Shelf is sturdy, clean and attractive looking, and stretched to fit perfectly in my cabinet space (I used two, side-by-side). REALLY like--there was some kind of issue with the delivery of this first time around--not sure what happened (lost at some point), because *I* never had to even get involved in getting it squared away, except to tell Amazon to re-order (at no extra-charge to me). Even with that glitch, I still had the product in less than a week. Really great customer service by the manufacturer/Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Orr

customer_reviews.title: Is as-described
customer_reviews.text: Almost gave 4 stars due to I thought the height between shelves could be a bit more, but I can't really count off for information that was available in the description. Overall very satisfied, and my spices are now organized better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This little shelf is solid, beautifully made, and extremely versatile. I bought it for my spice cabinet. Easy to use, packaged really well. It's so refreshing to see such high quality in a product. Highly recommend this little shelf.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at the wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: When you order this stuff you keep your fingers crossed re: weight/flimsy and wood quality. I was pleasantly surprised. I wish they made bigger versions as long as the plastic white ones that hold canned goods.
customer_reviews.author: marabou7

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I had been on the hunt for a spice rack for a while. I’ve had a few before but they weren’t sturdy and the spices would slip off & cause a domino effect. My spice jars fit perfectly on this rack and it looks aesthetically pleasing. You are able to adjust the length which is perfect because I’m constantly trying new spices. Get it!! It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Nice bamboo
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Very nice bamboo quality. Expands to approximately 15". Great for spices of the typical size. For other items be sure to measure, the shelves are i think 3" deep. The finish is nice in that there's a shiny finish, so would be be difficult to change to another finish, as asked in the question section, without sanding.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Most useful to see all seasonings if they are different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Where it stretches to fit the space there is an uneven level, and the levels are not as effective if all the season container/bottles are the same size. The bamboo is a nice aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Pensive Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to display spices that was simple and straightforward. This little shelf is perfect. The color of the bamboo is gorgeous and vibrant. It's excellent quality and has made cooking so much easier. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Love my bamboo shelf! I was looking for something that would work for my essential oil’s but that wouldn’t cost an arm and a leg... Came up on someone else’s review that said she uses hers for her essential oil’s and thought I would give it a try... It’s perfect! Good quality, beautiful wood and great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sha Shells

customer_reviews.title: Great or drawers! Sticker damaged the wood but I'm buying another!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: size for drawer, color, durable, helpful.Love the spice rack. Perfect for the taller square spices (better than the round spices). Con:pealing off the sticker it damaged the bamboo. I am getting another becasue I like this rack so much
customer_reviews.author: Lyndy Davis

customer_reviews.title: very practical
customer_reviews.text: great space saver and very easy for cleaning around it. simply slide it out of the way! love that it extends also. (had forgotten it did and thought i needed another one!) holds the regular sized spice jars perfectly and i buy bulk so i buy the jars, label them and i have a perfect spice orchestra!
customer_reviews.author: totally at peace

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spice rack to keep things tidy and off my counter. At first I had it upside down and my drawer wouldnt close with the spice jars in it, but then I realized it was upside down and that fixed it. I have standard depth drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: okay, but design could be improved
customer_reviews.text: These are not very helpful--I agree with other posts that suggest each level should be taller. You can't see what's on the shelf. It does make the cupboard look a little less crowded, but it would have been a lot more helpful it each level was taller. If you have the patience, I highly recommend measuring this out to see how it will work for you. I ignored the reviews about the height--I just hoped for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: great to organize spices in cabinet
customer_reviews.text: works very well and good quality. helps clean up a cabinet full of spices so you can see what is going on. only gripe is the step where the two sections meet makes it hard to put another jar on because it sits at an angle. very good product though!
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as it just didn't fit in my small cabinet. However, it was of good quality and the price is great! I really liked how you could extend it too. It should start with a smaller size and continue to extend out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Dube

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: This spice rack is really handy -- especially for a short person. Everything is laid out in front of you, instead of moving things around in a cupboard, searching for what you need. It's pretty, too.
customer_reviews.author: edavis

customer_reviews.title: Have to allow for clearance after spices added to rack.
customer_reviews.text: Love love the concept of this spice rack. I bought two of these to put in drawers on either side of cook top island. They fit great but once I put the spices in the drawers will not close because the clearance in the drawer is too low. Very sleek and high quality construction. Wish this would have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Use
customer_reviews.text: This is nicely made unit, but the big plus was that it had the perfect height, length, and (with adjustment) width for my side cabinet spice jars.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R

customer_reviews.title: Great design, sturdy and extremely functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly awesome product. I used it for kitchen organization for jams another sauces and can see things that are at the back. But I can see this being used for display purposes as well since it looks so great.
customer_reviews.author: Dkorator

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and obviously the box was open before they sent it to me.
customer_reviews.text: Someone else must have realized this was a terribly made product and returned it. The box was definitely opened before they retaped it up and sent it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a shelf that comes in the length you need.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to be able to adjust the width, but doing so creates separate levels on the same shelf so the spices on the seem lean. That or you have to skip a space. Overall it does the job I bought it for, but next time I might buy a shelf that comes in the length I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't adjust well returning
customer_reviews.text: unless your cabinet is the right size the the spices don't fit and lean or fall becomes the adjustable shelf is about 1/8th thick.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't quite what we expected and it came damaged from shipping. I expected it to extend the length of my cabinet but unfortunately it didn't. By using it I actually fit less in my cabinet than before. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Length Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Was able to adjust to my cabinet size with ease. Left room for larger items behind. Made looking for different spices easy
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Ours is in a cabinet and covered in spices so we never see it, but it make it much easier to see what you have in the cupboard in a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: awesome organizer
customer_reviews.text: When its not pulled out its a decent size to squeeze between appliances. I like the stairs effect because I can see all the spices. Havent use the extended portion so not sure if the durability is as good as the main portion.
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: For more than spices!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find something that would look nice on my office bookshelf to hold lots of ink bottles, I found this great little shelf and decided to give it a try. What can I say - it works wonderfully! It holds about 18 bottles of fountain pen ink when the extension is fully pulled out, and it looks very nice, and solid, and like it costs much more than I actually paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: sgw

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these tiers. Going to get more. Made my kitchen cabinet organizing so easy! Really like that they expand to fit a larger area.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Line Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: The natural wood is a nice look, but the rounded edges don't feel super modern. Other than that, happy with it and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my spice cabinets when I was trying to organize them! They work great and looks amazing in my cabinet! I would highly recommend if you are looking to organize!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Weed

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo 😍
customer_reviews.text: Very nice 👍 I’m really into bamboo at the moment and this was just the perfect addition to organizing our spices. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: Good adjustable storage
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could keep my most used spices organized by the stove and it works perfectly, my only complaint is that the extendable portion has to sit a little lower so it can fit back in, and that's about as minor as complaints can get.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lipken

customer_reviews.title: No more 'Where's the blasted oregano?' !
customer_reviews.text: A very handy item. Should have gotten ages ago. No need to screw hardware into my cabinet, and everything fit! I placed the shelving towards the front so the not so often used products could be placed behind it and to the side. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Whyn's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing spices
customer_reviews.text: Love this because the color matches the interior of my kitchen cabinets and if you have all your spices in the same exact jars/containers they are perfctly organzied all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Rennock

customer_reviews.title: I like that even with the spices tilted slight upward
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these drawer organizers to fit side-by-side in what used to be my "junk" drawer. They hold about 12 spices per tray (4 per row) using the usual McCormick or Spice Islands sized jars. I like that even with the spices tilted slight upward, my drawer still closes easily (the drawer is 4 inches deep). The tray itself is very well constructed of sturdy wood that I anticipate will last for decades.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyKY

customer_reviews.title: Serves Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: This spice step rack has been versatile and made it easier for me to find the spices I'm looking for. It's a simple design, and doesn't feel high-quality, but it also doesn't feel too low-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelepi Ita

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and design
customer_reviews.text: The wood I received is already cracked and the design isn't great. Movement is not smooth and the way the telescopic arm extends, it makes for an uneven bump that leads to wasted space. I wish I could return this poor product, but looks like the seller policy prohibits returns.
customer_reviews.author: AmzCustomer2010

customer_reviews.title: Its a good idea and works for thr most part
customer_reviews.text: Its a good idea and works for thr most part, but after one tumble out of the shelf onto the counter the back ledge broke right away. I will be able to glue back together but it isnt super durable. Not that i plan on tossing it around, but if it falls for any reason again it will break entirely.
customer_reviews.author: A.NzTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice one bamboo!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, light weight, love the versatility of the slide mechanism. Good for holding your seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Organizing Spices on Shelves
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much that I bought 5 more. Very solid and adjusts easily. They have made the spice cupboard (and the medicine shelf) so much more manageable that I wish I had gone with standard spice jars instead of tins because more of them would fit across the expanse. My only complaint is the teetering effect that happens with jars that inevitably end up straddling the two sides when it's expanded. Otherwise perfect, and it's a reasonable price to pay for the convenience of adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Spice rack...its okay just wont get another one!
customer_reviews.text: When this spice rack is extended it seems flimsy and slightly crooked. Holds quite a few regular items. Color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rae rae

customer_reviews.title: Good clean look.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive wood tone. Solid build. Perfect fit in drawer. Perfect fit for spices.
customer_reviews.author: sgun73

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My counter looks so much organized. Great quality and ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA N

customer_reviews.title: Organization
customer_reviews.text: Expandable spice rack worked very nicely and you're able to see what you have in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Organzier Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Nice spice rack!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spice rack; attractive and a good price. Like how it expands; ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and had it for a couple of weeks. I realized I had more spices that I needed to organize and purchased another one. I can now easily find items and check to make sure I am not buying spices I already have. When I did the organizing I realize I had 4 bottles of basil.
customer_reviews.author: kappaman82

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my cupboard looks now that all the bottles have a place! It's still hard to see the labels but it's much easier to get to them. To fix this problem, I alphabetized them.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & helpful for organizing!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this organizer in one of my kitchen drawers. My only issue is that it is a little too tall for my drawer, so I need to purchase new containers for my spices so that I can use the rows more effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Elise McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelving color. Not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shelving when you need the extra space but don’t want so looking plastic.
customer_reviews.author: New to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: I have a spice drawer, this really helps keep them from sliding around. Well made!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: It asked me to rate adhesion, I don’t know why. It’s a sturdy great quality little spice thing. It helped me organize things exactly the way I want to.
customer_reviews.author: OneMandiPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly in my kitchen drawer and I am very pleased with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are simply wonderful. I looked at a lot of different racks ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are simply wonderful. I looked at a lot of different racks but these bamboo are beautiful and the perfect size. The expansion feature is great. I put two side by side for all my spice jars.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Second times a charm
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait a while to actually get to use this product. I received the first one and it was broken in the corner, so I sent it back and had a replacement shipped out rather quickly. I was upset that I had to wait even longer for it but I’m pleased with how fast they had it sent to me and worked with me. The new one came in great shape and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Tray with spices is too tall to close drawer
customer_reviews.text: These trays are beautiful and sturdy, but I had to return them because they're too tall (once the spices are added) in a standard 3" depth drawer. When the spices are laid on the tray, you can't close the drawer because they're taller than 3". Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: alectofury

customer_reviews.title: really neat design!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the fact that it can change size. I use it to put my beauty supplies on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: love this product!
customer_reviews.text: it was super easy to set up in my cabinet. my spices look amazing and so organized! Actually I had my 10 year old son set it up for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective. When expanded it slipped down and couldn't hold anything on that part without slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: R.Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable is a Must!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf offers so much versatility when organizing my cabinets. I entended it all the way out and all my main spices fit on it and now I can see everything I need and know where it is. It is still slightly hard to get to the spices on the back row depending on their size, but overall a functional and well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Medford

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend this shelf!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great find! I smile when I open my spice cabinet now because I can actually see everything. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Practical and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Helpful and versatile with a very reasonable price tag. Looks stylish and holds spice jars of various shapes and sizes which makes it more practical than traditional spice racks. I use mine on the kitchen counter but it also fits inside a cabinet. Other sizes are available for larger jars and canned goods. Easy to clean and move.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Effective and nice looking spice rack
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, functional spice rack. Looks great in our cabinet, which is a similar colour - almost looks as if it was built in. The tiers are nicely spaced and you can fit a fair amount of spices, etc. when it is fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Spice Rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon 3 years ago. It is very sturdy and well constructed.I just purchased another one to sit beside the first one.
customer_reviews.author: AllieE

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase. It makes my shelf a bit more organized. The only thing that could be improved would be if there was some sort of "lock' or stopper for it to be able to stay out. If i accidentally push something next to it, it starts to slide back in. Other than that I really like it! Will most likely order another for another shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Great rack, but be careful about needed depth of drawer.
customer_reviews.text: The rack was too tall for my use. When i put it in the drawer and put the spice bottles on it, the drawer wouldn't close. However, that was not the fault of the rack. I would recommend putting on the product description the number of inches of depth in the drawer that will be needed for the drawer to close, once spice bottles are in the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wast of money.
customer_reviews.text: Very small in size. Needs to be return. Not nice in shape and size at all
customer_reviews.author: Lalji

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing spices
customer_reviews.text: This expandable spice rack is lovely wood and an excellent way of making it easier to find the spices fo which one is looking,
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My spice cabinet is above my head aonwhen inwouldnpullmsomthomg morning out multiple bottles would fall out onto my head. It was a mess and I couldn’t see into the cabinet to find a particular spice because, as I mentioned, it’s above my head. This allowed me to put the spices that I use most frequently onto my counter in a decorative way. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: cucbkstxmaqcz

product_meta.title: Seville Classics 3-Tier Expandable Bamboo Spice Rack Step Shelf Cabinet Organizer
product_meta.description:
Size:Twin| Style:Cabinet

Organize your cabinets or pantry with Seville Classics 3-Tier Expandable Bamboo Spice Rack Step Shelf Organizer. This step shelf spice rack is handcrafted from fast-growing, sustainable, all-natural bamboo. Spice rack is designed to expand and fit your growing spice collection. The shelf nearly doubles in size when expanded from 8.75 to 15 inches wide. Step shelf design features three levels for easy storage and display of bottles; easily read labels at a glance. Ideal for use in your kitchen, pantry, bathroom or vanity area to organize spices, small bottles and jars, perfumes, nail polishes, lotions, or other cosmetics. Unit measures 8.25 inches deep and just over 3 inches high. Easy to wipe clean with soap and water; air dry and do not submerge.

 * Smooth stair-step design with 3 tiers of storage
 * Handcrafted from 100% sustainable, all-natural bamboo
 * Extends from 8.75" to 15" wide
 * Easy to wipe clean with soap and water; air dry and do not submerge

Specifications
Dimensions: (8.75" to 15.5" W) x 8.25" D x 3.3"H
Weight: 1 lbs. 
Model #: BMB17040

What's in the Box?
1 expandable bamboo spice rack

Limited 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty
Seville Classics products are backed by a 1-year limited warranty unless otherwise specified. The warranty protects against original defects in material or workmanship under normal home or office use for the duration of the warranty period.
feature_bullets: Organizer measures (8.75" to 15.5" W) x 8.25"L x 3.3" H
Expandable 3 step organizer designed for storing spice bottles and organizing kitchens, pantries, bathrooms and counter tops
Durable, attractive bamboo construction. Fast-growing and plentiful, bamboo is stronger and more sustainable than hardwood and plastic cabinet organizers; air dry and do not submerge
Steps measure 3 inches deep, providing plenty of room to organize spice jars, cans, sauces, jelly jars, vitamin and medicine bottles in addition to other goods

Use it for more than storing spices: use it as a display shelf for collectibles like Pop! Vinyl toys and other figurines; organize essential oils, store cosmetics like lipstick and nail polish, keep it as a drink rack in the kitchen, or use it as a perfume and cologne rack in the bathroom

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
